website_summaries.verdict: One of the most powerful electric leaf blowers, but it also has one of the bigger price tags.
pros: Delivers with a 12-amp motor, so it can handle the largest jobs with ease
Offers multiple speed settings, which is helpful for completing numerous types of jobs
Has a maximum airflow of 409 cu
ft. per minute and a maximum air speed of 210 miles per hour
cons: It's a heavy unit at 9.8 lbs., limiting how long you can use it without tiring

customer_reviews.title: This is a CORDED electric blower that will "Huff and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a CORDED electric blower that will "Huff and Puff and Blow Your House Down". Beware to all little pigs , living in straw huts in my neighborhood. You have been warned! No bloody batteries that need a charge just as you are about to finish a job. Yes , I know , cordless , battery powered tools are the wave of the future -- da da da ........ I would rather drag an extension cord around behind me than screw around with batteries. My preference.
customer_reviews.author: charles w swinford

customer_reviews.title: Nothing like a woman with a DeWalt !
customer_reviews.text: As a woman I was giggling that MY new leaf blower was bigger, stronger, (and louder)...than my neighbors! Its lightweight enough to move freely with and has awesome power. We have landscapers who come once a week but in between I prefer to keep things tidy. I did however decide to purchase Mpow Safety earmuffs to block out the sound....safety first.
customer_reviews.author: DogsRule

customer_reviews.title: You better be there when it's delivered
customer_reviews.text: Blower is great, a ton of power. Solid too. All the fittings are made to not slip off when the blower is at full power. The one thing is it came to my house in the dewalt box. Not in a regular cardboard box. I got home and there it was on my front steps displayed to anyone who wanted to take it
customer_reviews.author: Emir

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: Read the operation guide before using it. Figure out the attachment locks before you break something. Then start blowing. This is a powerful unit. Yes it is loud. Powerful = loud. It has a hefty motor and it gets heavy after an hour of use. If you want a blower that BLOWS, does not need recharging cycles, and is well designed then buy this one.
customer_reviews.author: L. Moses

customer_reviews.title: Blows The Rest Away...
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and...amazing. Recently had a 20 year old WeedEater electric die on me. I probably have bought and returned 5 different leaf blowers trying to find anything even close to the power of that one. Just when I thought it was hopeless and I was going to be stuck with crap that could barely blow leaves farther than four or five feet I got this one. I think the secret is the huge intake on the side. Obviously it won't function as a lawn vacuum and mulcher but that isn't what I need anyway. This one might cost $30-40 more than the rest, but it's worth every penny if you value your time.
customer_reviews.author: Steyr AUG

customer_reviews.title: Perfect car drier for detailing. Somewhat powerful.
customer_reviews.text: This blower is perfect for drying a car after a wash rather than using towels. The trigger lock is great for a constant blow and the two smaller tubes increase the air flow greatly. The pointed end tube is perfect for the engine bay or door jambs. Easy to hold with both handles but it is loud. Cord lock is a nice feature too. Fairly powerful. Got tired of my rechargeable blower dying half way through the job.
customer_reviews.author: CatDaddy & Biatch

customer_reviews.title: Small, maneuverable powerful enough.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this blower to do two things, 1) Blow the spider webs leaves and crud out of my 1931 detached, dilapidated garage. 2) I wanted a method to Blow the layer of very fine dust that collects on every thing in my woodworking shop, despite very good dust control. To those two purposes It works beyond my hopes. It will also handle your blowing needs in a small yard (standard city yard that is.) Need more, buy a gas operated, a cord limits mobility.
customer_reviews.author: PlumOD

customer_reviews.title: Powerful with Easy Handling
customer_reviews.text: This Dewalt blower is quite powerful for an electric model and I suspect it will last with regular use for years. It will make short work of construction dust and moderate piles of leaves and is light and maneuverable enough to use almost anywhere. It is NOT powerful enough for professional landscapers, who need a backpack petrol unit. ~JSmith
customer_reviews.author: JSmith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing electric leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic leaf blower with a really good amount of power. Comparable to my poullion gas blower that said it's 200mph. It did as good a job. Gas one stopped working recently, and any time I used it I stunk of gas for hours afterwards, can't be good for you. And terrible for the environment. Note it does not come with power cord, but that's no big deal I have one in the backyard foe lawn mower and hedge clippers.
customer_reviews.author: alex b

customer_reviews.title: Uses are discovered
customer_reviews.text: A fine blower with high velocity and variable speed from trigger control. I blow the grass from beneath my mower, dry the sheets on the line quickly if a storm is coming, blow out snow from the garage area beneath the door where the snowblower cannot get to, and blow out the garage to "sweep" it better than any broom. In fact, its idea to use on the front deck, and even indoors in hallways and tiled floors. Winner.
customer_reviews.author: WayneChicagoTop Contributor: Golf

customer_reviews.title: Work well and with solid sturdy construction but the attachment is a little short requiring ...
customer_reviews.text: Work well and with solid sturdy construction but the attachment is a little short requiring me to stoop over while using it. I purchased this product to blow dirt of the parking lot of my gas station. It does that job well just wish the front attachment was longer.
customer_reviews.author: V. Stevenson

customer_reviews.title: Makes leave clean up a "breeze"
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Was def not a Bad investment. Stubborn leaves don't stand a chance is the best way to define it. Used it after rain and it still knocked the leaves out of the ball park, so if it has no problem with wet leaves I know it will be more then effective on dry ones. I like to wash my car frequently to and then dry it off to prevent water marks and I plan to use this in replacement of the microfiber towels I currently use. I'm sure it'll work great! Best 100$ I ever spent. Can't wait to use it again!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect strength blower for my yard. It blows the big leaves but leaves the rocks and potted plants on the ground.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect strength blower for my yard. It blows the big leaves but leaves the rocks and potted plants on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Harim

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to keep my porch, side walk, and deck free from leaves and debris; worked perfectly. My husband has a much larger gas-powered back pack blower, which was just too heavy and difficult to start. I couldn't be more pleased with the power behind this blower, and the easy of use! I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Nan Thomas

customer_reviews.title: good but
customer_reviews.text: It's good Dewalt product so not lightweight. I got the corded one thinking it would be better in the long run. Now wished I had gotten something with a batter and was lightweight for my needs. I prefer something quick and easy and this one requires putting together and plugging in each time before an after using. Great Dewalt product just a little more trouble for me than I was thinking. Another lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: rv

customer_reviews.title: Dewalt's done it again!!!
customer_reviews.text: This blower is just what I was looking for! This is an electric plug in blower and it has to power to handling all work and household needs. It can also to be used to blow dry your cars. Perfect blower!!!
customer_reviews.author: Mannie

customer_reviews.title: Powerful!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big yard and lots of oak and hickory trees. Definitely need something powerful, and this fits the bill. I also like how it is balanced - I don’t have to strain to keep it at the right angle. It can handle wet leaves and hickory nuts. It certainly fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Electric Blower
customer_reviews.text: Great, powerful blower works as good as my gas unit for a normal size yard. I use it with a 100’ cord. DeWalt makes great equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Eppes

customer_reviews.title: Good power for an electric blower
customer_reviews.text: Moved over to an electric blower after another gas blower gave up on me. Yes there is a reduction in power but its still powerful enough to get the job done and i know i it will work when i need it. Powerful enough okay weight, balance is a little off but not crazy good blower.
customer_reviews.author: Paul B Smith

customer_reviews.title: sad to say
customer_reviews.text: Did every thing I had wanted it to do,,the only problem I had with it was because I am a small woman and it was heavy for as much as I had to do at one time,,so my husband took it and uses it and I had to get a lighter one,,sad to say,,,very powerful,,,,,works like a charm,,
customer_reviews.author: Diane Parrish

customer_reviews.title: Work well like every DeWalt.
customer_reviews.text: Only used a few times so far but its awesome! Powerful, and light to me. I use it for blowing out my garage and blowing off my zero turn. Works well!
customer_reviews.author: jjnew

customer_reviews.title: Worthwhile
customer_reviews.text: Big, but effective & not too loud. The switch has a variable lock-on that works well. Better than the mess and noise of a gas blower for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: woodcraft

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, Noisy .
customer_reviews.text: I expected much more from Dewalt. Very heavy, extremely noisy, bulky This is going back.
customer_reviews.author: S Y.

customer_reviews.title: Lots o power
customer_reviews.text: Lots of power. I’m really happy with how well it works.
customer_reviews.author: Rayc

customer_reviews.title: I bought this model because it was supposed to be quiet
customer_reviews.text: It is as loud as the gas powered model my gardener uses. In other words, no katter that it functions, it still goves everyone in the immediate neighborhood a headache, and no one can think. Dont buy it if you believe the marketing claims that the loudness is equal to a human conversation! Unless it is the commodities trading floor!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie McCain

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Got this to use on the back deck. Lightweight and easy to use. Wouldn't work in our yard. It's not heavy duty enough, but it's a great leaf blower for small jobs.
customer_reviews.author: CUofSC

customer_reviews.title: Powerful blower
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful blower. Love it although it’s a bit heavy. I added a strap so I can use my shoulder to carry
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: Works ok
customer_reviews.text: Quality seems pretty good. easy to use. It doesn't beat those big backpack gas blowers, but works ok for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: R. Rosinski

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: We have piles of leaves everywhere and the get in the garage. This took care of getting them into bags.
customer_reviews.author: Claude L. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Tough!! Strong!! Quality!!
customer_reviews.text: It's what I expect from a Dewalt! Quality, tough, strong, and yet easy to handle. Maneuverable
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Blows Me Away!
customer_reviews.text: The power produced by this DeWalt Blower fills my needs perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Terry Lent

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awsome blower, cant believe how powerful it is with havung a cord
customer_reviews.author: Jonn H.

customer_reviews.title: Power!
customer_reviews.text: The best electric blower I have owned - great for removing grass, leaves, and dirt from my garage, driveway, and sidewalks. Not as powerful as a gas powered blower, but this will get the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: Nice blower, but not as light weight as I thought it was going to be.
customer_reviews.author: Steel Horse

customer_reviews.title: Decent blower
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use. Could use a little more power but gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: TonyL

customer_reviews.title: Good power
customer_reviews.text: Not as light as other blowers but it has more power
customer_reviews.author: Lynda

customer_reviews.title: great.......
customer_reviews.text: a great 110V leaf blower......... use it for my porch for a quick cleaning...... at camping to clean the area off...... is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Justin p

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fast delivery and the expected DeWalt quality. Works great on decks and sidewalks. I can't speak to longevity as I have had it one week.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! The
customer_reviews.text: Now, that’s a blower! Lots of power gets the job done faster.
customer_reviews.author: Cara

customer_reviews.title: Plenty of power and good design choices but a bit heavy
customer_reviews.text: for extended use, this may be heavy for some, however, as it is powerful it makes jobs quick, so maybe not so bad after all!
customer_reviews.author: Dave K Barman

customer_reviews.title: Blows in a good way
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful for an electric blower. The extra power outweighs the convenience of a cordless blower...IMO.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Zumek

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is so strong that safety glasses are a must.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: works fine
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to dry off car. bit too big for that but still ok bc it is not heavy. Ideally it more of a leaf blower
customer_reviews.author: TheMBOD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent blower, much quieter than gas powered ones and a breeze to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Design flaw
customer_reviews.text: Spring-loaded plastic piece that holds the blower tube in is flimsy flimsy flimsy it was broken right out of the package ordered a second one because I thought it was a fluke that one was broken right out of the package little spring loaded clip not beefy enough cheap cheap cheap I am so disappointed in DeWalt I ordered it thinking was going to get a real top-notch product junk
customer_reviews.author: Wmurky

customer_reviews.title: Love my blower!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love it love it love it to use!!!! This blower good quality and also easy to use. It is not heavy at all, just perfect weight.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Partida

customer_reviews.title: it is perfect for me to blow my leaves with
customer_reviews.text: This leaf blower is just the thing to blow leaves off of any porch or out of any yard. it is perfect for me to blow my leaves with, it's not to heavy to use one handed and it has plenty of wind power to blow every leaf out of our yard.
customer_reviews.author: Old Rebel

customer_reviews.title: Great blower
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for big cmf and I got it with this blower, it is big and loud but moves a lot of air ! Ear plugs are a must with any blower and this is not just any blower!!
customer_reviews.author: lewis s. lansing

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT for fast yard cleanup.
customer_reviews.text: Works great and does a full yard clean up of leaves much faster than using a rake. Is a little heavy but, manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Maness-Yates

customer_reviews.title: Great Blower
customer_reviews.text: The blower has worked very well. It is almost as powerful as gas driven blowers. It is heavy and would be easier to use with a shoulder harness. It has exceeded my expectations and is exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Party Lady

customer_reviews.title: I'm very satisfied buying this air blower
customer_reviews.text: I'm very satisfied buying this air blower.Being connected to power through 100 feet gauge 12 it does the job ways better than the gas engine driven one. I'm recommending it to everybody interested in
customer_reviews.author: Steina

customer_reviews.title: DeWalt Excellence
customer_reviews.text: Superb snow blower/leaf blower. Yep, this is the one you want if you're going to tackle three to six inches of new snow. Make sure you use a heavy duty cord.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony S. Brezovski

customer_reviews.title: Freaky products are no good anymore
customer_reviews.text: After the third time, I couldn’t shut it off without unplugging it! Poor product! Buyer beware!
customer_reviews.author: Mayems

customer_reviews.title: blower
customer_reviews.text: used it few times but it seems to work well
customer_reviews.author: Randy Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: My only (minor) complaint: the tube could be about 6" longer. Otherwise, and in general, totally pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Electric leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: This blower is incredibly strong and easy to use. Great purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: works good for the money and the w b f very loud ..
customer_reviews.author: Mike.  Cobb

customer_reviews.title: very happy with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. My husband was very pleased with it.
customer_reviews.author: Lorri Keeton

customer_reviews.title: More powerful than my last one but a little bulky ...
customer_reviews.text: More powerful than my last one but a little bulky. Can control power with a trigger or lock the trigger.

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!, Hope it lasts as long as it ...
customer_reviews.text: Works Great ! , Hope it lasts as long as it works well .
customer_reviews.author: Victor

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: No history, but the air flow is powerful and the unit is balanced.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: This is a powerful blower and not too noisy; however, it becomes heavy with prolonged use.
customer_reviews.author: Mutti W

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: This sucker is strong! It requires a cord, but it's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Powerful - noisy and vibration strong
customer_reviews.text: Noisy and shaking- 2 days of use and plastic part came out- broken inside
customer_reviews.author: Anaj

customer_reviews.title: Terrific Blower
customer_reviews.text: This is a great blower, but it is too big for my tight spaces.
customer_reviews.author: Steven S. Weston

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Works great, a bit heavier then my old leaf blower but it's well worth the bit of weight to the power of the unit
customer_reviews.author: Ocean12

customer_reviews.title: Works great. More velocity than i expected from an electric ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great. More velocity than i expected from an electric model.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Product.
customer_reviews.text: This is a GREAT PRODUCT, its light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Gary L. Daenzer

customer_reviews.title: Lots of power!
customer_reviews.text: I really like this blower. It has plenty of power for cleaning up the driveway, clearing light snow, and leaf piling. I don't have any dislikes or gripes regarding the blowers performance. It comes with three different tips for concentrated or wider blowing needs. Although it is a bit on the heavy side. It is also kind of loud for an electric machine. It is well built and has a solid quality feel. I grew tired of buying and mixing fuel for my gas powered blower, so I went the electric route. Satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. R.

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, with a noise level to match
customer_reviews.text: With a 12 amp motor this blower moves a lot of air. It comes with three nozzles that lock on the hose, I use the concentrator nozzle to blast sticks, pine needles and other debris from the river rock mulch around my bushes, and the round nozzle to blow leaves or freshly mowed grass. It's commercial-grade motor makes it heavy compared to most other blowers I've owned (but that's what gives it its power) and you will want to use hearing protection when you use it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MarcR

customer_reviews.title: I love my new dewalt leaf blower
customer_reviews.text: I love my new dewalt leaf blower.I am a 63 yr old woman and I have a lot of land and I have to rake 4 times a season.I finally said enough.I got my new blower and wow it works great.Very strong power.It is a little heavy but has a stand attached so I can rest it.Its one speed and you don't have to keep finger on button while it's on which is a plus.It drives leaves far.I just love it .you won't be disappointed.😊👍
customer_reviews.author: kathy

customer_reviews.title: I am small Lady and is sort of big for ...
customer_reviews.text: I am small Lady and is sort of big for me, but I still used it! a lot of power!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful blower
customer_reviews.text: It's nice. Snap on the attachments and go. Made doing gutters more interesting. Nothing like finally getting to the top of the ladder just to have the power cable fall off the plug and sequentially the roof. I fault it more to my extension cable though and the clunky process of climbing. Other than that, it's easy and cheap for your standard suburban dwelling.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Bought this unit after my battery died on my cordless ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this unit after my battery died on my cordless for a second time Has lots more power and even an adjusted on lever that has veritable speeds
customer_reviews.author: Retired in Misssouri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This blower totally blew me away with how strong it is and very durable (excuse the pun)..
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Good strong blower
customer_reviews.text: was worn out with gas blowers, taking 50 pulls to crank, this is a nice option, blows strong, a little tough on you for long periods--it torques a lot when you pull the trigger
customer_reviews.author: Fish30114

customer_reviews.title: It has great pressure.
customer_reviews.text: This was a Birthday gift for my husband and he loves it! It has great pressure.
customer_reviews.author: PT

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great, why haven't I purchased one of these before now!
customer_reviews.author: JGH

customer_reviews.title: Table saw loud
customer_reviews.text: SO so so so so so noisy. It's about the noise level of a table saw and that's not what I want to lug around the back yard. It was very powerful and undoubtably would have done a good job... just at the expense of my hearing.
customer_reviews.author: Zuckerman, not Zuckerberg

customer_reviews.title: I'm giving this 4 stars because it has a cord ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this 4 stars because it has a cord and a cord never get 5 stars from me. However, I'll take the cord over combustion engine and today's batteries any do. Advantages of a cord over rechargeable, more powerful and should last longer. Over gas, there's no fooling around with gas, winterizing and pulling a rope to start it. One caveat with the cord, can't use it in a large yard unless you have a lot of cord and the more cord you have to use the more batteries or combustion will seem convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel B. Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Sent this one back. It's very heavy and for ...
customer_reviews.text: Sent this one back. It's very heavy and for it's size doesn't blow very hard.
customer_reviews.author: Don

customer_reviews.title: Be ready to annoy the neighbors
customer_reviews.text: Very Very Loud, We thought being Electric it would be less noise than a gas powered unit, this thing has a high pitched whine that is annoying, the gas unit is actually a low level noise that is far easier to tolerate
customer_reviews.author: Attn4d

customer_reviews.title: It's very powerful!! Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.text: Instead of sweeping the balcony or vacuuming sand out of the car I use this blower!!! It's very powerful so it is noisy but you don't have to have it on for long because it gets the job done quickly with little effort.
customer_reviews.author: Meeshaview22

customer_reviews.title: Nice Blower Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Works real well and does the job can’t go wrong with Dewalt
customer_reviews.author: Tony M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Power
customer_reviews.text: The power is great, will move small sticks and wet leaves with no problem.
customer_reviews.author: C. Fuller

product_meta.title: DEWALT DWBL700 Elec Blower
product_meta.description: Quickly and thoroughly power through debris with variable speed trigger and speed lock to control air flow. Standard round nozzle provides 409 CFM of air volume at 145 MPH. Flat concentrator nozzle increases air speed to 189 MPH with 288 CFM of air volume. Use 1 In. round concentrator nozzle for blowing out crevices and concrete anchor holes at 210 MPH with 82 CFM of air volume. Includes: standard round nozzle, flat concentrator nozzle, and 1 In. round concentrator nozzle. 3 year . This product is manufactured in China. This product meets customer requirement.
feature_bullets: Quickly and thoroughly power through debris with variable speed trigger and speed lock to control air flow
This product is manufactured in China

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars246 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
